idea-plugin.name: SAP Commerce Developers Toolset
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin is a plugin for SAP Commerce integration.

If you have any questions you can send an email to:
  • EPAM Systems

Features:

  • Import of Hybris extensions to Intellij IDEA with automatic dependency resolution and classpath configuration optimized for fast compilation.
  • Automatic configuration of Spring, Web, Ant, Database Connector Intellij IDEA plugins.
  • Import your custom Eclipse, Maven and Gradle extensions together with Hybris platform.
  • Custom editor for Flexible Search queries with an ability to execute them on a remote Hybris instance right from your IDE by a single click of a button.
  • Custom editor for Impex files with automatic formatting, find usages and go to declaration actions, validation and import of impexes into a remote Hybris instance right from your IDE by a single click of a button.
  • Custom editor for items.xml with validation, best-practices analyses, quick-fix autosuggestion and easy navigation.
  • Custom editor for beans.xml & cockpitng with custom automated Intellij refactorings actions.
  • Visualization of business process graph (use context menu of the file "Diagrams/Show Diagram", only Ultimate IDEA).
  • Preview for Type and Bean Systems.
  • Enhanced Debugger for Model classes with lazy evaluation.
  • Enhanced project view tree.
  • Execution of Flexible Search queries, Groovy scripts, Impexes though IDE using HAC Integration tool.
  • Execution of queries on remote Solr instances.
  • And much more

Contribution guidelines:

  • Please read Contributor License Agreement
  • Available tasks are in our board: Project board
  • How to Configure Project Environment For Plugin Developers
  • We are working with Pull Requests. You need to fork this repository, implement a feature in a separate branch, then send us a pull request.
  • Be sure to include into your pull request and all commit messages the following line: "Signed-off-by: Your Real Name your.email@email.com" otherwise it can not be accepted. Use your real name.
  • For additional questions you can send an email

Contributors and Developers

This project exists thanks to all the people who contribute.

  • Alexander Bartash
  • Vlad Bozhenok

idea-plugin.change-notes:
2023.1.2

  • Feature: Improved PSI cache usage (#258)
  • Feature: Improved performance of the Global Meta Model and TS LineMarker (#257)
  • Feature: IDEA modules by default will be stored in the /.idea/idea-modules (#259)
  • Bug Fix: Fixed Ant targets registration after Project Refresh
  • Other: Added registration of the latest Ant targets
  • Other: Updated to Kotlin 1.8
  • Other: Removed custom rt-ant support, it did not work at all

2023.1.1

  • Feature: Added possibility to import CCv2 folders as modules (#238)
  • Feature: Added more custom icons (#237)
  • Feature: Added custom icons for CCv2 project tree modules (#239)
  • Feature: Added completion and navigation for items.xml - metatype attribute (#242)
  • Feature: Added inspection for items.xml - metatype attribute (#243)
  • Feature: Added possibility to identify if extension is an addon (project refresh required) (#245)
  • Feature: Improved Inlay hints for dynamic attributes (#250)
  • Feature: CockpitNG: added merge-by dependant contribution for parent (#247)
  • Feature: CockpitNG: added merge-by dependant complex contribution & inspections for parent (#248)
  • Feature: Updated custom icons for Business Process diagrams (#246)
  • Feature: Show progress of the Type System Global Meta Model creation (#252)
  • Feature: Show progress of the Bean System Global Meta Model creation (#253)
  • Feature: Show progress of the CockpitNG Global Meta Model creation (#254)
  • Feature: Improved project startup and shutdown, show items.xml validation progress (#255)
  • Bug Fix: Fixed code completion for requires-extension within extensioninfo (#244)
  • Deprecation: Decreased usage of the Deprecated API (#251)

2023.1.0

  • Feature: Compatibility adjustments (#195)
  • Feature: Added CCv2 SAP Commerce Cloud manifest.json schema support (#225)
  • Feature: Added CCv2 DataHub manifest.json schema support (#226)
  • Feature: Added CCv2 Javascript Storefront manifest.json schema support (#227)
  • Feature: Added completion of the available extensions for CCv2 SAP Commerce manifest.json file (#229)
  • Feature: Added extension name validation Inspection for CCv2 SAP Commerce manifest.json file (#231)
  • Feature: Added completion and validation for extension pack for CCv2 SAP Commerce manifest.json file (#234)
  • Feature: Added completion and validation for template extension for CCv2 SAP Commerce manifest.json file (#235)
  • Feature: Added possibility to group by Item parent for Type System preview (#211)
  • Feature: Added completion and navigation for Index attributes within items.xml (#207)
  • Feature: Added completion for meta tags within extensioninfo.xml (#230)
  • Feature: Improved representation of the available extensions listing (#233)
  • Feature: Improved project startup performance (#210)
  • Feature: Added listing of references for id attribute within Business Process definition (#214)
  • Feature: Added listing of references for multiple Cockpitng definitions (#216)
  • Feature: Added completion and navigation for onError attribute within Business Process definition (#215)
  • Feature: Improved Project Structure information notification content (#217)
  • Feature: Improved code completion within items.xml (#221)
  • Feature: Improved validation of properties within bean declaration to highlight duplicate properties (#220)
  • Feature: Disable spell check for properties with custom named values (#228)
  • Bug Fix: Impex & FlexibleSearch actions always visible (#223)
  • Bug Fix: SAP Commerce Project specific Settings should be visible only for [y] projects (#206)
  • Bug Fix: Not all extension names shown in the code completion (project refresh required) (#232)
  • Other: Upgraded to Gradle 8 (#222)

2022.3.1

  • Feature: Enabled IDEA capability to open new Project as SAP Commerce Project (#132)
  • Feature: Introduced the Bean System Management - the powerful tool to observe SAP Commerce bean system (#76)
  • Feature: Introduced new Debugger Java Type Renderers for Model classes (#123)
  • Feature: Introduced automatic Plugin Update Checker (#127)
  • Feature: Introduced flattened Types for Code Completion (#153)
  • Feature: Moved Remote Instances under Project settings, as well as Active Remote Instance selection (#133)
  • Feature: Added completion for Relations and Enums for FXS files (#200)
  • Feature: Added completion for required-extension under extensioninfo.xml (#149)
  • Feature: Filter out already defined extension dependencies in the completion for extensioninfo.xml (#150)
  • Feature: Added possibility to change current Project settings (#131)
  • Feature: Added possibility to preview preformatted Flexible Search Queries and copy them to Clipboard (#118)
  • Feature: Added customized Structure View for beans.xml files (#113)
  • Feature: Added new localextensions.xml inspection rules
    • Unknown Extension declared as dependency (#156)
  • Feature: Added new extensioninfo.xml inspection rules
    • Unknown Extension declared as dependency (#154)
    • Dependency on the same Extension declared multiple times (#154)
  • Feature: Added new beans.xml inspection rules (#88)
    • Duplicate Enum definition inspection
    • Duplicate Enum Value definition inspection
    • Duplicate Bean Property definition inspection
  • Feature: Added navigation to items.xml Type attributes from generated classes (#120, #71)
  • Feature: Enabled [y] plugin settings sharing through Settings Sync (#163)
  • Feature: Added navigation to items.xml Relation declaration from generated classes (#168)
  • Feature: Added navigation to items.xml Enum values declaration from generated classes (#115)
  • Feature: Added navigation to beans.xml Enum values declaration from generated classes (#111)
  • Feature: Added navigation to beans.xml Bean property declaration from generated classes (#112)
  • Feature: Added navigation to alternative declarations of the beans within beans.xml (#78)
  • Feature: Added navigation to items.xml for Types used in the Cockpitng configuration files (#166)
  • Feature: Added code completion for Impex translator modifier (#158)
  • Feature: Added code completion for Impex cell-decorator modifier (#159)
  • Feature: Added code completion and enriched navigation within Business Process (#171)
  • Feature: Added code inspection for Impex: unknown type (#160)
  • Feature: Added extra visibility filters for Type and Bean System views (#99)
  • Feature: Added dynamic prefix getters/setters in the Java classes (#74)
  • Feature: Redesigned and improved performance of the Structure View for items.xml files (#114)
  • Feature: Show label for dynamic attribute during Impex code completion (#110)
  • Feature: Inspection for beans.xml rely on whole Bean System, not only current file (#88)
  • Feature: Regrouped [y] Application settings into separate sections (#130)
  • Feature: New Remote Instance Wizard will prefill some data from [y] properties (#143)
  • Feature: Added -backoffice-config.xml DOM model and custom Icon (#161)
  • Feature: Added -backoffice-widgets.xml DOM model and custom Icon (#164)
  • Feature: Added localextensions.xml DOM model and custom Icon (#155)
  • Feature: Added extensioninfo.xml DOM model and custom Icon (#147)
  • Feature: Added process.xml DOM model and custom Icon (#148)
  • Feature: Decreases cognitive complexity for Code Completion and custom Icons (#152)
  • Feature: Added Cockpitng files (widgets, config, definition) support, Model, completion and navigation (#165, #174, #169, #172, #173, #175, #176, #177, #182, #178, #179, #180, #181, #185, #186)
  • Bug Fix: Wrong range in reference in Impex/FlexibleSearch files in case of header Type or Columns changes (#196)
  • Bug Fix: FlexibleSearch code completion should not be case-sensitive for attributes (#167)
  • Bug Fix: [y] Tool Window Logo too dark for New UI (#95)
  • Bug Fix: [y] Tool Window is not available after project import (#125)
  • Bug Fix: Impex config processor inspection does not work (#100)
  • Bug Fix: Process diagram layout shows actions in reverse order (#151)
  • Bug Fix: Focus is not propagated properly on Copy Impex/FlexibleSearch to Console action (#124)
  • Bug Fix: Generate Business Process Diagram action is not available (#96)
  • Bug Fix: Platform module should not be identified as Gradle project (#141)
  • Bug Fix: Consoles are not disposable (#142)
  • Bug Fix: Exception on Copy to console if triggered on file without extension (#157)
  • Bug Fix: Adjusted FlexibleSearch icon (#192)
  • Bug Fix: Default values for Type System modifiers
  • Deprecation: Decreased usage of the Deprecated API (#107, #106, #101, #94, #91, #89, #134, #135, #136, #137, #138, #139, #140, #83, #81, #146)
  • Ultimate only
    • Feature: Added navigation to TypeCode Interceptor declaration(s) (#188)
    • Feature: Register -backoffice-spring.xml files, Project re-import is required (#183)
    • Feature: Added code completion and navigation for Cockpitng 'spring-bean' element (#184)
    • Feature: Introduced new items.xml Annotator for Attribute Handler (#117)
    • Feature: Added highlighting if Spring bean used in Business Process is not available (#170)

2022.3.0

  • Feature: Added 2022.3 support
  • Feature: Introduction the Type System Management - the powerful tool to observe SAP Commerce type system (#62, #60)
  • Feature: Added support of the Enum completion in Impex/FSQ
  • Feature: Added support of the Relation completion in Impex/FSQ
  • Feature: Added MapType support for items.xml
  • Feature: Added postgresql DB mapping
  • Feature: Added next typecode suggestion via items.xml Inspection
  • Feature: Added possibility to change [y] items.xml Inspection levels (previously they were hardcoded in ruleset.xml)
  • Feature: Improved performance of the items.xml inspection
  • Feature: Extended/refactored type system inspection rules
  • Feature: Merged ToolsWindows "Hybris" (as Remote Instances) and "Hybris Console" (as Consoles) altogether with "Type system" into "Hybris" as a single entry point for all [y] related actions
  • Deprecation: Decreased usage of the Deprecated API

2022.2

  • Feature: Added 2022.2 support
  • Feature: Feature Add inline actions for Impex & FlexibleSearch files (#53)
  • Feature: Do not index node_modules directories (#52)
